!Nameless Spirit: Well, I found out where he was hiding, but it already had a *magic force field* around it. According to Wigoth, the force field uses a *song as its password*. Therefore, we need *a certain type of continuous wavelength* to pass through the force field. I hate to say it, but I'm afraid I know him better than anyone else... The song he chose for his password is probably... [Quest _119_LastImperialPrince printessa_spirit_q0119_05.htm|"What?"]
